title: ARIES Bull Bar Install: AdvantEDGE™ Bull Bar on Toyota Tundra 2152000, 2162000
description:
This video demonstrates the installation of the ARIES 2152000 AdvantEDGE™ Bull Bar on a 2014 Toyota Tundra.  This bull bar is available in a carbide black or chrome powder coat finish.  The AdvantEDGE™ Bull Bar is designed to complement today's modern truck.  It also is available with matching side steps, and headache rack to finish the look of your truck.

Features Include:
High-strength, lightweight, aluminum construction
Universal track mounting system for easy and secure installation
5 1/2" octagonal design

Vehicle Coverage:
2007-2016 Toyota Tundra

Part #
2162000 (Carbide Black Powder Coat)
2152000 (Chrome Powder Coat)
tags: Aries AdvantEDGE Bull Bar, how to install, Toyota Tundra, Aries 2152000, Aries 2162000, aries advantage bull bar
